thread.title: BRIEF-Bombardier Signs Long-Term Maintenance Contract For Melbourne's First High-Capacity Signalling System

title: BRIEF-Bombardier Signs Long-Term Maintenance Contract For Melbourne's First High-Capacity Signalling System
text:
April 18, 2018 / 1:25 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Bombardier Signs Long-Term Maintenance Contract For Melbourne's First High-Capacity Signalling System Reuters Staff 
April 18 (Reuters) - Bombardier Inc: 
* BOMBARDIER SIGNS LONG-TERM MAINTENANCE CONTRACT FOR MELBOURNEâ€™S FIRST HIGH-CAPACITY SIGNALLING SYSTEM 
* BOMBARDIER - BOMBARDIER TRANSPORTATION SIGNED A CONTRACT WITH METRO TRAINS MELBOURNE 
* BOMBARDIER - CONTRACT IS VALUED AT APPROXIMATELY 77 MILLION AUD AND INCLUDES AN OPTION FOR FIVE ADDITIONAL YEARS OF MAINTENANCE SERVICES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
